colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,CES SOGS KLU RNAMS DANG RANG GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I DON DU BSNGO GYIS RGYAS BTAB PA PO ZHES KLU BSANG GTOR TSUL MDOR BSDUS 'DI NI DANG BRTZON LDAN PA DKON MCHOG SNYAN GRAGS KYIS SKUL NGOR, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SNGAGS RAMS PA DKON MCHOG KUN DGA'O, ,
